# rbingood

> Paid beach and park cleanups with real, verified results in Portugal.

rbingood organizes paid environmental cleanups across Portugal, creating value for three groups: participants earn €10 per cleanup, business sponsors receive CSRD-ready ESG reports with GPS-verified data, and cities get cleaner public spaces.

## Key Facts

- Founded by Ksenia Em and Kate Mikholap
- Based in Cascais, Portugal
- 17+ cleanup events completed
- 322+ community members
- 2,100+ kg of waste collected
- 6 sponsored events with recurring partner Praia Irmão

## How It Works

1. A sponsor finances a cleanup
2. Participants register and show up
3. Cleanup lasts ~2 hours
4. Results are documented (photos + GPS coordinates)
5. Participants receive €10, sponsors get an ESG Data Pack (PDF/Excel/GPS/CO₂ for CSRD reporting)

## For Participants

- Earn €10 per sponsored cleanup (~2 hours)
- Payment within 3–5 business days (bank transfer or MB Way)
- Flexible schedule — choose events that work for you
- Cleanups near your location in Portugal
- All equipment provided (gloves, bags, grabbers)
- No experience needed

## For Business Sponsors

- ESG data with GPS-verified before/after photos
- CSRD-compliant reporting (ESRS S3 audit-ready)
- Team building opportunities for employees
- Brand visibility at events (logo on vests, bags)
- Quick setup — from 3 days
- Starting at €350 per cleanup (6+ participants)

## For Local Businesses

- Barter partnership (water, snacks, coffee for participants)
- "Good Neighbor" status — plaque at your establishment
- Foot traffic from cleanup participants
- Build loyalty with local community

## For Cities and Events

- Clean zones outside regular municipal routes
- Engaged residents and local communities
- Gamification for festivals and events
- Verified impact data for city reports
- Case study: DHB Festival — 3,000+ visitors, 1,700 cigarette butts collected in 3 days

## Available Add-ons

- Scaling (multiple locations)
- Corporate events
- Catering
- Branded merchandise
- Extended PR coverage
- Custom reporting
- Educational workshops
